Uses of Class
chessapi4j.functional.Move

  • Packages that use Move 
    Package Description
    chessapi4j
    This package contains the object orientated classes of chessapi4j.
    chessapi4j.functional
    This package contains classes that are especially well-suited for functional programming and for applications that operate in multithreaded environments.

    • Uses of Move in chessapi4j

      Constructors in chessapi4j with parameters of type Move 
      Constructor Description
      MovementException​(Move move, Position position)
      Creates a new instance of MovementException with a message that indicates that the move is illegal for the position.

    • Uses of Move in chessapi4j.functional

      Subclasses of Move in chessapi4j.functional 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  PGNMove
      Represents a move with Portable Game Notation (PGN) properties.
      Methods in chessapi4j.functional that return Move 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static Move Factory.move​(int origin, int target)
      Creates a move from the origin and target square
      static Move Factory.move​(int origin, int target, int promotionPiece)
      Creates a move from the origin and target square, and a promotion piece
      static Move Factory.move​(long move, int origin)
      Creates a move from a bitboard representation and origin square.
      static Move Factory.move​(long move, int origin, int promotionPiece)
      Creates a move from a bitboard representation, origin square, and promotion piece.
      static Move Factory.move​(Square origin, Square target)
      Creates a move from the origin and target square
      static Move Factory.move​(Square origin, Square target, Piece promotionPiece)
      Creates a move from the origin and target square
      static Move Factory.move​(String move, boolean whiteMove)
      Takes a move string (UCI notation) and a boolean indicating the player who moves and return the move representation.
      Methods in chessapi4j.functional that return types with arguments of type Move 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      List<Tuple<Position,​Move>> Position.children()
      Retrieves the children of the current position in a List of Tuple<Position, Move> format.
      List<Tuple<Position,​Move>> Generator.legalMoves​(Position position)
      Generate all the legal moves for a given position.
      static Optional<Move> PGNHandler.toUCI​(Position position, String sanMove)
      Converts a chess move given in Standard Algebraic Notation (SAN) to Universal Chess Interface (UCI) format (Pure Coordinate Notation).
      Methods in chessapi4j.functional with parameters of type Move 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean Position.isLegal​(Move move)
      Checks if the given move is legal for the current position.
      Game Game.move​(Move move)
      Add the move to the game and returns this game instace.
      Position Position.move​(Move move)
      Returns the position that results from the given move.
      static String PGNHandler.toSAN​(Position position, Move move)
      Converts a chess move given in Universal Chess Interface (UCI) format (Pure Coordinate Notation) to Standard Algebraic Notation (SAN) format.
      Method parameters in chessapi4j.functional with type arguments of type Move 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Game Game.addMoves​(List<? extends Move> moves)
      Adds a list of moves to the game instance.
